title: Yorkshire Water’s smart network pilot helps reduce leakage by 90k litres a day
lead: The water company is looking to reduce leakage by a further 15% by 2025, reducing waste and helping customers save money on their bills

title: Squeezed electricity! Oranges power water treatment plant
lead: Nearly one tonne of oranges is needed to produce the equivalent of five homes’ consumption in one day

title: A common market doesn’t mean common prices for energy across Europe
lead: If you’re operating in Europe, our latest European Energy and Sustainability Services podcast series to be launched covers commodity markets important to businesses managing facilities and contracts across Europe.

title: Google spin-off Malta raises $50m for long duration energy storage system
lead: Its system can provide a daily or weekly load cycle by efficiently storing up to 200 hours of energy storage, though early systems will focus on current market applications in need of 10 to 12-hour durations

title: Centrica’s profits collapse by 31% in 2020
lead: The energy supplier also reported a £362 million loss from continuing operations

title: Drivers to pay up to £690 to park their cars outside their home
lead: Owners of most ‘polluting’ vehicles will have to pay an annual fee

title: SMS commits to becoming carbon-neutral by 2030
lead: The smart meter installer will adopt renewable on-site generation and the use of EVs for its operations in the UK and Ireland

title: German solar batteries demand soar by nearly 50% in 2020
lead: The annual market for stationary battery storage will double by 2025, new report estimates

title: Sweet move! Sugar in your fuel tank
lead: New petrol mix made of biofuel could cut emissions by 750,000 tonnes

title: Environment Agency: Climate emergency hitting ‘worst case scenario’ levels
lead: Chief Executive Sir James Bevan said if left unchecked, climate change will kill more people and do much more harm, than COVID-19
